channel.title: Help with possible command?
channel.description:
i was just wondering how i could possibly make it to where when you get a skill to level 90+ it sends a message every level something like
hellobud's woodcutting level is now 99!

item.title: Help with possible command?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

hellobud:

i was just wondering how i could possibly make it to where when you get a skill to level 90+…

90+, Zezima.

[quote=“hellobud, post:8, topic:170955”]ok well would i have to put like this???

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[91]"!; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[92]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[93]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[94]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[95]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[96]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[97]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[98]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[99]"1; }[/quote]

No, read mine again.

Read full topic

ok well would i have to put like this???

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[91]"!; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[92]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[93]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[94]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[95]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[96]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[97]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[98]"1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s strength has reached to "+playerLevel[99]"1; }

item.title: Help with possible command?
item.dc:creator: @zezimaisme111 zezimaisme111
item.description:
@zezimaisme111 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:170955”]Edit your levelup method.
For each case add:

if(playerLevel[skill] >= 90) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"\'s whatever level is now "+playerLevel[skill]+"!"; } [/quote]
need to get rid of >= 90 requirement :o

Read full topic

item.title: Help with possible command?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Edit your levelup method.
For each case add:

if(playerLevel[skill] >= 90)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"\'s whatever level is now "+playerLevel[skill]+"!";
}
